elements.name: encounter_text
elements.text:
In the vast, starry expanse of the cosmos, your starship glides out of the hyperspace gate towards a hulking mass of asteroids. Like ancient, battered sentinels, the space rocks floated in the void, their jagged surfaces glinting dully in the faint light of a distant sun.

Inside the ship's command center, you gaze intently at the main view screen, your eyes narrowed in concentration as you consider your options.

"Captain," EXA's voice echoed through the bridge speakers, "We are approaching the asteroid field. Passive scans reveal no signs of activity within, but an active sensor pulse may alert any potential observers."

The AI's words were punctuated by the soft hum of the ship's engines, the air was crisp and clean, recycled by the efficient life support systems.

The asteroids represented a potential bounty of valuable resources: precious metals, minerals, perhaps even something more... exotic.

elements.name: button_option_1
elements.text: "Active sensors, EXA. Tell me what's out there."

elements.name: button_option_2
elements.text: "Launch the collectors, see what we can mine around us."

elements.name: button_option_3
elements.text: "There's nothing for us here. Jump us out."
